EmailTemplate.name: Multiple Lead Assignment Notification - G&T
EmailTemplate.subject: Multiple leads have been assigned to you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LEAD ASSIGNMENT NOTIFICATION
Hello {!Lead.OwnerFullName},
Multiple leads have just been assigned to you.
Click here to view your new leads:
https://officedepot.my.salesforce.com/00Q?fcf=00BE00000059NEH
This is a system generated email. Please do not reply.
